ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: and(not(ISCHANGED( GGP_Number__c )),$Profile.Id != '00e30000001YLF7',(or( RecordType.Name='VOC' , RecordType.Name='VOC Read Only' )),(or(Quality_Customer_Expectations__c = '', Quality_Summary__c ='')) , (or(text( Quality_Customer_Rating__c) ='Yellow - Somewhat Dissatisfied' , text( Quality_Customer_Rating__c) = 'Red - Very Dissatisfied')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please check that Quality Customer Expectations and Quality Summary fields are filled.
